title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7031.5 - Notary public
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7031.5 - Notary public

State Regulations

The services of a notary public or commissioner of deeds
shall be made available to prisoners within one business day after a prisoner's
request for the notarization or attestation of his signature. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7031.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
